title: DJ Sona skin is bugged. Using her normal lines instead of her special lines.
body:
When using DJ Sona she is not using her special audio lines. Instead she's using the lines from her base skin. The music is playing, but the lines are wrong.

In the DJ Skin her audio is kinda mashed up bits of dialog that go with the current song.

But instead of hearing 
http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/7/73/SonaDJKinetic.attack01.ogg/revision/latest?cb=20150211022533

I was hearing
http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/1/14/Sona.attack4.ogg/revision/latest?cb=20121120023719

replies.body:
Hey Destaice,

When this happened, did you happen to be Polymorphed at any point in the game?

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=K6XnJgXb,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-01-21T22:20:29.002+0000)
>
> Hey Destaice,
> 
> When this happened, did you happen to be Polymorphed at any point in the game?

Actually yes. The enemy team had a Lulu that game.

Aha! That would do it. We're currently investigating this issue. Polymorph has been known to cause some weird issue, like in this particular case!

This can be fixed currently by toggling back to another form as DJ Sona.
That's the issue, well known too, unfortunate it hasn't been fixed yet
